About

Hello...

...my name is Sergey. I'am a switcher. I am a beginner front-ender. My purpose is to become a JS developer. Namely, to work with the React.js & Vue.js frameworks. It is this direction that I like the most in a large selection of possible front-end directions. A huge desire to learn and develop in this sphere, where mental work is appreciated. The desire to find work with a smart, friendly and responsive team. Thank you for your attention to my resume.
